com.aionemu.gameserver.controllers
Class VisibleObjectController<T extends VisibleObject>

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.gameserver.controllers.VisibleObjectController<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreatureController, GatherableController, StaticObjectController
public abstract class VisibleObjectController<T extends VisibleObject>
extends java.lang.Object

This class is for controlling VisibleObjects [players, npc's etc]. Its controlling movement, visibility etc.

Author:
-Nemesiss-
